about_the_game:
Train World is a railroad simulation game set throughout the ages of the railroad. Test your railway network against the passage of time as you continually upgrade your trains from basic steam locomotives to complex, multi-engine haulers. Transport passengers, move thousands of tonnes of cargo, and manage your increasingly busy network as the centuries fly by!

DESIGN A RAILWAY NETWORK THAT CAN WITHSTAND CENTURIES



Can you build a rail network that can withstand centuries? Plan your network, build new stations manage your train lines, and research new technologies and train types! As you continue to expand, unlock new regions - allowing you to grow your network and access beautiful locations and additional passengers and cargo types!

Train World features multiple types of bridges, tunnels, and tracks - as well as more than 30 different types of cargo to transport - meaning that you can truly build the network of your dreams!

LOGISTICS AND STRATEGY WITH QUALITY-OF-LIFE FEATURES!



Train World features logistics and strategy - from a fully-fledged research system spanning 3 time periods, dozens of different locomotives and wagons to build your own train sets, and a dynamic economy system - whilst retaining all the quality-of-life features you could need!

Feeling impatient? Speed up time! Need some direction or extra cash? Train World features an achievements system, giving you optional objectives to complete. Want a high-level view of your network? Choose between a classical top-down view or a more detailed view upon zooming in.

SPACE FOR YOUR CREATIVITY



Train World features maps ranging from small 33X33 km (20X20 miles) to huge 197X197 km (120X120 miles), with plenty of room to build your railway network. Different biomes and relief types provide beautiful scenery.

Maps are divided into regions that can be opened during the game. Each region has its industry, adding another strategic component to the gameplay.

FEATURES

  • Dozens of locomotive and car options to build your train sets!
  • A research tree that spans 3 time periods, each with distinct visuals, trains, and infrastructure.
  • A dynamic economy system, featuring over 150 unique types of cargo to transport.
  • Multiple types of bridges, tunnels, and tracks are used to construct your network.
  • A passenger and cargo system, each with its own stations and infrastructure.
  • An optional objective system for earning cash - and providing direction if needed.
  • Beautiful maps with plenty of space for your rail network.
  • Choose between a high-level top-down view, or a more zoomed-in, detailed view!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2320 or AMD Ryzen 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280 or better (2048MB VRAM or more, with Shader Model 5.0)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7300 or AMD Ryzen 1600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon R9 390 or better (2048MB VRAM or more, with Shader Model 5.0)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers

short_description: Become a railroad pioneer in Train World - a railway simulator that spans centuries as you design, manage, and operate your own train network. Start at the dawn of railroad technology and evolve into a complex, modern railway company.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese
